readable.title: 2067833088_04e84e5bf2
readable.content: A hiker posing for a photo in an arid mountain landscape . A man in a green hat poses in the mountains A man in a green hat standing on a slope in front of a mountain . a man in camouflage hiking gear , wearing a green pouch is standing in the foothills . A person in hiking gear is standing on a hill with a mountain in the background .
